High Priest Sylvain:
Congratulations! You have now become a proud Oracle, a priest of Eva. Many more trials and hardships await you, but I trust that you will overcome them all. May Einhasad and Eva bless and keep you always.
This is a small gift that we have prepared to help you on your journey. Take this to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you will be able to exchange it for a usable Shadow Weapon.
